market.title: Software Company Buyer
market.description:
Large integrated software company offers $100,000 cash for inventive software program and related company.
Everyone may sell at this price.
If you sell, give up the cash flow you currently receive from this company.

market.title: Limited Partnership Sold
market.description:
The business has been sold and you receive twice your original cost for your share of it.
You agreed to sell if and when the founder sold out, as she just did. New owners have their own financing.
Every limited partnership is affected. If you own a limited partnership, receive cash and reduce your cash flows immediately.

market.title: Limited Partnership Sold
market.description:
The business has been sold and you receive three times your original cost for your share of it.
You agreed to sell if and when the founder sold out, as he just did. New owners have their own financing.
Every limited partnership is affected. If you own a limited partnership, receive cash and reduce your cash flows immediately.

market.title: Collector Wants Gold Coins
market.description:
Collector looking for authentic 1500's Royal Spanish New World (Havana mint only) "pieces of eight" gold coins.
Everyone may sell at this price.
Cash offer of $5,000 for each coin.

market.title: Apartment House Buyer
market.description:
Buyer offers $40,000 per unit on all units in apartment houses. Has own financing, needs to invest now.
Everyone may sell at this price.
If you sell, pay off the related mortgage and give up the cash flow you currently receive on this property.

market.title: Plex Buyer
market.description:
Buyer offers $35,000 per unit for all units in any combination of duplexes, 4-plexes, or 8-plexes. Has own financing.
Everyone may sell at this price.
If you sell, pay off the related mortgage and give up the cash flow you currently receive on this property.

market.title: Interest Rates Drop!
market.description:
Interest rates on home loans drop to 5%.
If you (no other players) own any 3Br/2Ba rental houses you may sell them for $50,000 more than the original cost.
If you sell, pay off the related mortgage and give up the cash flow you currently receive on each property.

market.title: Price of Gold Soars
market.description:
Rioting in Middle East. Oil prices threatened. Price of gold skyrockets to $600 per ounce.
Everyone who owns 1 ounce Krugerrands may sell at this price.

market.title: Plex Buyer
market.description:
Buyer offers $25,000 per unit for all units in any combination of duplexes, 4-plexes, or 8-plexes. Has own financing.
Everyone may sell at this price.
If you sell, pay off the related mortgage and give up the cash flow you currently receive on this property.

market.title: Condo Buyer — 2Br/1Ba
market.description:
You are offered $55,000 for a 2/1 rental condo. Buyer has own financing.
Everyone may sell at this price.
If you sell, pay off the related mortgage and give up the cash flow you currently receive on this property.

market.title: Inflation Hits!
market.description:
Inflation goes to 10%. Interest rates climb to 20% on home loans.
All 3Br/2Ba rental houses that you (no other players) own are now in foreclosure. You financed with variable rate mortgages.
You must give your 3Br/2Ba house(s) back to the bank. You lose your cash flow from these properties.

market.title: Apartment House Buyer
market.description:
Buyer offers $45,000 per unit for all units in apartment houses of any size. Has own financing. [His 1031 tax deferred exchange time is running out.]
Everyone may sell at this price.
If you sell, pay off the related mortgage and give up the cash flow you currently receive on this property.

market.title: Apartment House Buyer
market.description:
REIT offers $30,000 per unit for all units in apartment houses of 12 units or more. Has own financing. Buyer has funds from sale of complex in another city.
Everyone may sell at this price.
If you sell, pay off the related mortgage and give up the cash flow you currently receive on this property.

market.title: Demand for Bed & Breakfast
market.description:
Couple burned out from their corporate jobs are ready for a change. Have lots of cash. Looking for a profitable Bed & Breakfast. They will pay $250,000 today.
Everyone with a Bed & Breakfast that is making money may sell at this price.
If you sell, pay off the related mortgage and give up the cash flow you currently receive on this property.

market.title: House Buyer — 3Br/2Ba
market.description:
You are offered $65,000 for a 3/2 rental house. Buyer has own financing.
Everyone may sell at this price.
If you sell, pay off the related mortgage and give up the cash flow you currently receive on this property.

market.title: Apartment House Buyer
market.description:
Buyer offers $25,000 per unit for all units in apartment houses of any size. Has own financing. [His 1031 tax deferred exchange time is running out.]
Everyone may sell at this price.
If you sell, pay off the related mortgage and give up the cash flow you currently receive on this property.

doodad.title: Couldn't Resist New Painting By Local Artist
Your Daughter's Wedding
doodad.description:
Costs you $2000
(if you have a child)

doodad.title: Go to a Concert!
doodad.description:
Dinner, Tickets, & Coffee
Sets you back $180

doodad.title: Buy Big Screen TV
doodad.description:
Pay $4000
(Credit cards OK. If you buy on credit add $4000 to credit cards liability and add $120 to your monthly expenses.)

doodad.title: Rumor of Layoff
doodad.description:
Go back to school for added skills.
Pay $220 for tuition & books.

doodad.title: Birthday!
doodad.description:
Take kids to the amusement park and spend $100
(if you have a child)

doodad.title: Shopping Spree!
doodad.description:
Buy new wristwatch (even though you already have 3)
Pay $150

doodad.title: New Boat!
doodad.description:
Pay $1,000 down and $17,000 on time.
(Add a $17,000 boat loan as a new Liability and add a new boat loan payment of $340 to Expenses.)

doodad.title: Buy a Café Latte & Cappuccino for You & a Friend
